      <div class="block">
       <h2>
        Wonen en leven
       </h2>
       <a href="/thema/wonen-en-leven">
        <img alt="Wonen en leven" height="142" src="/~/media/images/meeus/grote-blokken/thema/wonen/wonen-en-leven.jpg?la=nl-nl&amp;h=142&amp;w=460" style="height: 142px; width: 460px;" width="460"/>
       </a>
       <a class="bullet-3" href="/thema/wonen-en-leven" title="Lees de tips, inspiratie &amp; praktische informatie">
        Lees de tips, inspiratie &amp; praktische informatie
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="block expointsBottom" id="plccontent_0_plchomecenter_0_plcbigblocks_3_divBlock">
       <h2 id="plccontent_0_plchomecenter_0_plcbigblocks_3_H2Title">
       </h2>
       <div class="block col-lg-3 col-md-6" id="reviewWidget" itemscope="" itemtype="http://www.schema.org/Product" style="max-width: 453;">
        <h2 style="font: 20px/22px 'DaxBold',Verdana,Arial,Sans-serif;
    color: #0056a7;
    margin: 0 0 7px;">
         Klanten over
         <span itemprop="name">
          Meeùs
         </span>
        </h2>
        <div class="row">
         <div class="col-xs-1 col-sm-1" style="width:25%; float:left;">
          <div class="rating-visual" style="position:relative;">
           <img src="https://www.widgets.expoints.nl/reviews/images/meeus/visual.jpg" style="width:100%;"/>
           <span style="color:#FFFFFF; position:absolute; top:30px; left:30px; font-size:36px; font-weight:bold;">
            8.2
           </span>
           <div class="reviewStars" style='width: 43px; height: 16px; background-image: url("https://www.widgets.expoints.nl/reviews/images/stars_meeus2.png"); background-color: #f1f1f1; position:absolute; bottom:15px; left:42px;'>
            <div class="reviewStarsColored" style='width: 32px; height: 16px; background-image: url("https://www.widgets.expoints.nl/reviews/images/stars_meeus2.png"); background-color: #ffe708;'>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="col-xs-9 col-sm-9 rating-info" style="width:70%; float:left; margin-left:5%;">
          <div class="rating-quote" style="font: 12px 'DaxBold', Verdana,Arial,Sans-serif; color:#0053a5; line-height:21px;">
           <span>
            "Prima, geen gedoe. Zaken snel en goed geregeld." Klant J. Bekkers
           </span>
          </div>
          <div class="rating-text" itemprop="aggregateRating" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" style="font: 12px 'DaxBold', Verdana,Arial,Sans-serif; color:#000000; line-height:21px; margin:10px 0px; 5px 0px">
           <meta content="0" itemprop="worstRating"/>
           <span class="count-reviews" itemprop="ratingCount" style="color:#0053a5;">
            3436
           </span>
           klanten waarderen onze Klantenservice 
					met een gemiddelde van
           <span class="count-score" itemprop="ratingValue" style="color:#0053a5;">
            8.2
           </span>
           .
           <meta content="10" itemprop="bestRating"/>
          </div>
          <small style="display:block; line-height: 30px;">
           <span style="float: left; margin-right: 5px;">
            Powered by
           </span>
           <a class="logoExpoints" href="https://review.expoints.nl/reviews/meeus/meeus-klantenservice" rel="nofollow" style="border: none; text-decoration: none; float: left;" target="_blank">
            <span style='display: block; width: 40px; height: 15px; margin-top: 11px; margin-bottom: 4px; background-image: url("https://www.widgets.expoints.nl/reviews/images/logo.png");'>
            </span>
           </a>
          </small>
         </div>
         <div style="clear:both;">
         </div>
         <a class="bullet-3" href="https://meeus.com/over-meeus/klanten-over-ons" title="Lees wat onze klanten over ons zeggen">
          Lees alle beoordelingen
         </a>
         <style>
          a.bullet-3 {background: url('https://www.widgets.expoints.nl/reviews/images/meeus/bullet_orange_big.png') no-repeat 95% center; padding: 10px 40px 10px 10px; border: 1px solid #d8d9da; border-radius: 3px; display: block; text-decoration:none; font-size:12px; color: #333;}
			a.bullet-3:hover {background: #f78e1e url('https://www.widgets.expoints.nl/reviews/images/meeus/bullet_white_big.png') no-repeat; background-position: 95% center; color: #fff; text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px #999;}
         </style>
        </div>
       </div>

       <style>
        .carousel li img {
    width: auto !important;
    }
       </style>
      </section>
      <script type="text/javascript">
       $(document).ready(function() {
	$(".template-2coll").each(function () {
		var template2coll = $(this).text().trim();
		if (template2coll == "") {
			//
			var imageBlock = "";
			if ($(this).find(".intro_image figure").html() != undefined)
			{
				imageBlock = $(this).find(".intro_image figure").html().trim();
			}
			var blockBlock = "";
			if ($(this).find(".coll-content .block").html() != undefined)
			{
				blockBlock  = $(this).find(".coll-content .block").html().trim();
			}
			if (imageBlock == "" && blockBlock == "" && $(this).find(".location_map").html() == undefined) {
				$(this).hide();
			}
		}
	});
});
      </script>
      <style>
       footer .details li {
    padding: 0 10px;
}
      </style>
     </div>
    </footer>
